PHRASE.LANG: kName
Armour Pack: Patriot, Wonder Weapon and Devil Girl
Ensemble Armure : Patriot, Wonder Weapon et Devil Girl
Rüstungsbündel: Patriot, Wonder Weapon und Devil Girl
Pacchetto di armature: Patriot, Wonder Weapon e Devil Girl
Pack de armadura: Patriot, Wonder Weapon y Devil Girl
아머 팩: 애국자, 최종병기, 마성의 소녀 (여성)
Armor Pack: Patriot, Wonder Weapon and Devil Girl (Women)
裝甲服裝組：愛國者、卓越武器及惡魔女孩(女用)
裝甲服裝組：愛國者、卓越武器及惡魔女孩(女用)
Armor Pack: Patriot, Wonder Weapon and Devil Girl
kDesc

Contains the following three full Armour sets for you to mix and match, Patriot Light Armour Set, Wonder Weapon Medium Armour Set and Devil Girl Heavy Armour Set, contains the following fifteen parts: 
 
 1. Patriot - Light Field Body Armour 
 2. Patriot - Light Field Boots 
 3. Patriot - Light Field Glove 
 4. Patriot - Light Field Helmet 
 5. Patriot - Light Field Leg Armour 
 6. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 7. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Boots 
 8. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Gloves 
 9. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Helmet 
 10. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Leg Armour 
 11. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 12. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Boots 
 13. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 14. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 15. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

Vous n'aurez que l'embarras du choix avec ces trois ensembles Armure complets (Ensemble Armure: Patriot, Wonder Weapon et Devil Girl), contenant les quinze éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Patriot - Gilet de terrain léger 
 2. Patriot - Bottes de terrain légères 
 3. Patriot - Gant de terrain légers 
 4. Patriot - Casque de terrain léger 
 5. Patriot - Jambières de terrain légères 
 6. Wonder Weapon - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 7. Wonder Weapon - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 8. Wonder Weapon - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 9. Wonder Weapon - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 10. Wonder Weapon - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 11. Devil Girl - Gilet de combat lourd 
 12. Devil Girl - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 13. Devil Girl - Gants de combat lourds 
 14. Devil Girl - Casque de combat lourd 
 15. Devil Girl - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Enthält die folgenden drei kompletten Rüstungssets für Dich zum Kombinieren: Leichtes Rüstungsset Patriot, Mittelschweres Rüstungsset Wonder Weapon & Schweres Rüstungsset Devil Girl; umfasst die folgenden fünfzehn Teile: 
 
 1. Patriot - Leichte Panzerweste 
 2. Patriot - Leichte Stiefel 
 3. Patriot - Leichte Handschuhe 
 4. Patriot - Leichter Helm 
 5. Patriot - Leichte Beinrüstung 
 6. Wonder Weapon - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 7. Wonder Weapon - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 8. Wonder Weapon - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 9. Wonder Weapon - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 10. Wonder Weapon - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 11. Devil Girl - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 12. Devil Girl - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 13. Devil Girl - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 14. Devil Girl - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 15. Devil Girl - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Contiene i tre set di armature seguenti che possono essere mischiati tra loro: set di armatura leggera Patriot, set di armatura media Wonder Weapon e set di armatura pesante Devil Girl. Contiene i 15 componenti seguenti: 
 
 1. Patriot - armatura per il corpo da combattimento leggero 
 2. Patriot - stivali da combattimento leggero 
 3. Patriot - guanti da combattimento leggero 
 4. Patriot - casco da combattimento leggero 
 5. Patriot - armatura per le gambe da combattimento leggero 
 6. Wonder Weapon - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 7. Wonder Weapon - stivali d'assalto medio 
 8. Wonder Weapon - guanti d'assalto medio 
 9. Wonder Weapon - casco d'assalto medio 
 10. Wonder Weapon - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio 
 11. Devil Girl - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 12. Devil Girl - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 13. Devil Girl - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 14. Devil Girl - casco da combattimento pesante 
 15. Devil Girl - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

Contiene los tres siguientes sets de armadura, que podrás combinar entre ellos: Patriot ligera, Wonder Weapon media y Devil Girl pesada. Se compone de las 15 partes siguientes: 
 
 1. Patriot - Armadura corporal de campo ligera 
 2. Patriot - Botas de campo ligeras 
 3. Patriot - Guantes de campo ligeros 
 4. Patriot - Casco de campo ligero 
 5. Patriot - Armadura de campo ligera para pierna 
 6. Wonder Weapon - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 7. Wonder Weapon - Botas de asalto medias 
 8. Wonder Weapon - Guantes de asalto medios 
 9. Wonder Weapon - Casco de asalto medio 
 10. Wonder Weapon - Armadura de asalto media para pierna 
 11. Devil Girl - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 12. Devil Girl - Botas de combate pesadas 
 13. Devil Girl - Guantes de combate pesados 
 14. Devil Girl - Casco de combate pesado 
 15. Devil Girl - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

다음과 같은 세 개의 방어구 세트의 15개 아이템을 포함합니다. 자유로운 연출이 가능합니다 - 애국자 경량 방어구 세트, 최종병기 중형 방어구 세트, 마성의 소녀 강화 방어구 세트:
 
 1. 애국자 - 경량 야전 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 애국자 - 경량 야전부츠 (여성)
 3. 애국자 - 경량 야전장갑 (여성)
 4. 애국자 - 경량 야전헬멧 (여성)
 5. 애국자 - 경량 야전 하체방어구 (여성)
 6. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (여성)
 7. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격부츠 (여성)
 8. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격장갑 (여성)
 9. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (여성)
 10. 최종병기 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (여성)
 11. 마성의 소녀 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (여성)
 12. 마성의 소녀 - 강화 전투부츠 (여성)
 13. 마성의 소녀 - 강화 전투장갑 (여성)
 14. 마성의 소녀 - 강화 전투헬멧 (여성)
 15. 마성의 소녀 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

Contains the following three full armor sets for you to mix and match, Patriot Light Armor Set, Wonder Weapon Medium Armor Set and Devil Girl Heavy Armor Set, contains the following fifteen parts:
 
 1. Patriot - Light Field Body Armor (Women)
 2. Patriot - Light Field Boots (Women)
 3. Patriot - Light Field Glove (Women)
 4. Patriot - Light Field Helmet (Women)
 5. Patriot - Light Field Leg Armor (Women)

 9. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Helmet (Women)
 10. Wonder Weapon - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Women)
 11. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Women)
 12. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Boots (Women)
 13. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Gloves (Women)
 14. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Helmet (Women)
 15. Devil Girl - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Women) [#Legal]

包括愛國者輕型裝甲服裝組、卓越武器中型裝甲服裝組及惡魔女孩重型裝甲服裝組3套裝甲服裝組，可用作自由配搭。當中包括下列15個部分：
 
 1. 愛國者 - 輕型野外護甲(女用)
 2. 愛國者 - 輕型野外靴子(女用)
 3. 愛國者 - 輕型野外手套(女用)
 4. 愛國者 - 輕型野外頭盔(女用)
 5. 愛國者 - 輕型野外護脛(女用)
 6. 卓越武器 - 中型突擊護甲(女用)
 7. 卓越武器 - 中型突擊靴子(女用)
 8. 卓越武器 - 中型突擊手套(女用)
 9. 卓越武器 - 中型突擊頭盔(女用)
 10. 卓越武器 - 中型突擊護脛(女用)
 11. 惡魔女孩 - 重型戰鬥護甲(女用)
 12. 惡魔女孩 - 重型戰鬥靴子(女用)
 13. 惡魔女孩 - 重型戰鬥手套(女用)
 14. 惡魔女孩 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(女用)
 15. 惡魔女孩 - 重型戰鬥護脛(女用) [#Legal]
